section.p: This clinical statement represents the response to an undesired symptom, finding, etc. due to administered or exposed substance. This reaction may be an undesired symptom, finding, etc. or it could be a desired response to a treatment. A reaction can be defined with respect to its severity, and can have been treated by one or more interventions.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-7323, CONF:1098-10523, CONF:1098-32504 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.9"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Reaction Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.9)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-16851)/@code="ASSERTION" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:1098-31124, CONF:1098-32169)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1098-7329)
contain zero or one [0..1] text
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-7328)/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1098-19114)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7337, CONF:1098-7338, CONF:1098-15920)
This procedure activity is intended to contain information about procedures that were performed in response to an allergy reaction.
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Conforms to Procedure Activity Procedure2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.14:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7340, CONF:1098-7341, CONF:1098-15921)
This medication activity is intended to contain information about medications that were administered in response to an allergy reaction.
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Conforms to Medication Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7580, CONF:1098-7581, CONF:1098-15922)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Severity Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.8:2014-06-09)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
entryRelationship with target entry ProcedureActivityProcedure2 SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:1098-7343)
entryRelationship with target entry MedicationActivity2 SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:1098-7344)
entryRelationship with target entry Severity Observation (V2) SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" TRUE (CONF:1098-10375)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
SHALL conform to Reaction Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.9)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7325, R2.0=CONF:1098-7325)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7326, R2.0=CONF:1098-7326)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1098-7329)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-16851)/@code="ASSERTION" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:1098-31124, CONF:1098-32169)
contain zero or one [0..1] text
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-7328)/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1098-19114)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:7332, R2.0=CONF:1098-7332)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (Reaction Coded) with @xsi:type="CD", which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Problem 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.7.4 DYNAMIC (CONF:7335, R2.0=CONF:1098-7335)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7337, CONF:1098-7338, CONF:1098-15920)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Conforms to Procedure Activity Procedure2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.14:2014-06-09)
This procedure activity is intended to contain information about procedures that were performed in response to an allergy reaction.

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7340, CONF:1098-7341, CONF:1098-15921)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Conforms to Medication Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16:2014-06-09)
This medication activity is intended to contain information about medications that were administered in response to an allergy reaction.

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7580, CONF:1098-7581, CONF:1098-15922)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Severity Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.8:2014-06-09)
SHALL satisfy: The value set for this code element has not been specified. Implementers are allowed to use any code system, such as SNOMED CT, a locally determined code, or a nullFlavor (CONF:16852)
text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15917)
reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15918)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15919)
effectiveTime, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] low (CONF:7333, R2.0=CONF:1098-7333)
effectiveTime, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] high (CONF:7334, R2.0=CONF:1098-7334)
entryRelationship with target entry Severity Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" TRUE (CONF:10375)
entryRelationship with target entry ProcedureActivityProcedure SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True(CONF:7343). (CONF:7343)
entryRelationship with target entry MedicationActivity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True. (CONF:7344)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
entryRelationship with target entry ProcedureActivityProcedure2 SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:1098-7343)
entryRelationship with target entry MedicationActivity2 SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:1098-7344)
entryRelationship with target entry Severity Observation (V2) SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" TRUE (CONF:1098-10375)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:7323, CONF:10523 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.9"

Consol Reaction Observation SHALL satisfy: The value set for this code element has not been specified. Implementers are allowed to use any code system, such as SNOMED CT, a locally determined code, or a nullFlavor (CONF:16852)
Consol Reaction Observation text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15917)
Consol Reaction Observation reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15918)
Consol Reaction Observation reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15919)
Consol Reaction Observation effectiveTime, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] low (CONF:7333, R2.0=CONF:1098-7333)
Consol Reaction Observation effectiveTime, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] high (CONF:7334, R2.0=CONF:1098-7334)
Consol Reaction Observation entryRelationship with target entry Severity Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" TRUE (CONF:10375)
Consol Reaction Observation entryRelationship with target entry ProcedureActivityProcedure SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True(CONF:7343). (CONF:7343)
Consol Reaction Observation entryRelationship with target entry MedicationActivity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True. (CONF:7344)
SHALL conform to CDA Observation
Consol Reaction Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7325, R2.0=CONF:1098-7325)
Consol Reaction Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7326, R2.0=CONF:1098-7326)
Consol Reaction Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:7329)
Consol Reaction Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:16851)
Consol Reaction Observation SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] text (Reaction Free Text) (CONF:7330)
Consol Reaction Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:7328)
Consol Reaction Observation SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:7332, R2.0=CONF:1098-7332)

Consol Reaction Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (Reaction Coded) with @xsi:type="CD", which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Problem 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.7.4 DYNAMIC (CONF:7335, R2.0=CONF:1098-7335)

Consol Reaction Observation SHOULD contain [0..1] entryRelationship (Severity) such that it (CONF:7580, CONF:7581, CONF:15922) Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ, and Conforms to Severity Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.8)

Consol Reaction Observation MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:7337, CONF:7338, CONF:15920) Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON, and Conforms to Procedure Activity Procedure (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.14)

Consol Reaction Observation MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:7340, CONF:7341, CONF:15921) Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON, and Conforms to Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)
